org.ietf.nea.pb.message

Class PbMessageFactoryIetf

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ietf.nea.pb.message.PbMessageFactoryIetf

  • public final class PbMessageFactoryIetf
extends Object
    Factory utility to create a IETF RFC 5793 compliant TNCCS message.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static long VENDORID 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      private PbMessageFactoryIetf()
      Private constructor should never be invoked.

        Creates a TNCCS message containing an access recommendation.
        Parameters:
        recommendation - the access recommendation
        Returns:
        an IETF RFC 5793 compliant TNCCS message
        Throws:
        ValidationException - if creation fails because of invalid values

      • createIm

        public static PbMessage createIm(PbMessageImFlagEnum[] imFlags,
                 long subVendorId,
                 long subType,
                 int collectorId,
                 int validatorId,
                 byte[] imMessage)
                          throws ValidationException
        Creates a TNCCS message containing an integrity measurement component message. Uses the given values to address the message.
        Parameters:
        imFlags - the flags to set for the message
        subVendorId - the vendor ID of the component
        subType - the type of the component
        collectorId - the source/destination IM(C) ID
        validatorId - the source/destination IM(V) ID
        imMessage - the serialized integrity measurement component message
        Returns:
        an IETF RFC 5793 compliant TNCCS message
        Throws:
        ValidationException - if creation fails because of invalid values

      • createLanguagePreference

        public static PbMessage createLanguagePreference(String preferredLanguage)
                                          throws ValidationException
        Creates a TNCCS message suggesting a preferred language for human readable strings.
        Parameters:
        preferredLanguage - the RFC 3282 preferred language
        Returns:
        an IETF RFC 5793 compliant TNCCS message
        Throws:
        ValidationException - if creation fails because of invalid values

      • createReasonString

        public static PbMessage createReasonString(String reasonString,
                           String langCode)
                                    throws ValidationException
        Creates a TNCCS message with a string describing a reason for an assessment result and access recommendation in the given language.
        Parameters:
        reasonString - the reason string
        langCode - the RFC 4646 language code
        Returns:
        an IETF RFC 5793 compliant TNCCS message
        Throws:
        ValidationException - if creation fails because of invalid values

      • createErrorOffset

        public static PbMessage createErrorOffset(PbMessageErrorFlagsEnum[] errorFlags,
                          PbMessageErrorCodeEnum errorCode,
                          long offset)
                                   throws ValidationException
        Creates a TNCCS message containing an error with information where the error occurred in another message.
        Parameters:
        errorFlags - the flags to set for the error
        errorCode - the code describing the error
        offset - the offset from the message beginning to the erroneous value
        Returns:
        an IETF RFC 5793 compliant TNCCS message
        Throws:
        ValidationException - if creation fails because of invalid values

      • createErrorVersion

        public static PbMessage createErrorVersion(PbMessageErrorFlagsEnum[] errorFlags,
                           short badVersion,
                           short maxVersion,
                           short minVersion)
                                    throws ValidationException
        Creates a TNCCS message containing an error with information about the supported version.
        Parameters:
        errorFlags - the flags to set for the error
        badVersion - the unsupported version
        maxVersion - the maximum supported version
        minVersion - the minimum supported version
        Returns:
        an IETF RFC 5793 compliant TNCCS message
        Throws:
        ValidationException - if creation fails because of invalid values
